sentences.en: All offers and sales are subject to the terms and conditions printed the reverse side hereof.
sentences.cn: 所有报盘和销售均应遵守本报价单背面所印的条款.

sentences.en: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land.
Any modification hereof shall be limited to the amended item.
sentences.cn: 修改公司章程,只对所修改条款作出修正案.

sentences.en: Construction This Agreement and the interpretation hereof operate in conjunction with the Working Group Bylaws.
sentences.cn: 2解释本协议及其解释应联系工作组章程细则.

sentences.en: In confirmation hereof we attach a bank statement.
sentences.cn: 为作这方面的确认我们附上银行结单.

sentences.en: The amount of each drawing must be endorsed on reverse hereof.
sentences.cn: 每笔汇票金额必须在信用证背面给予签注.

sentences.en: The classification of goods shall be defined in the Enforcement Rules hereof.
sentences.cn: 商品之分类,于施行细则定之.

sentences.en: The con - sciousness of brand of clothes is hereof.
sentences.cn: 衣服品牌意识就在于此了.

sentences.en: The prescriber and the user of this productmust master the terms hereof.
sentences.cn: 开处方的医生和使用本品的患者均须掌握文中术语.

sentences.en: Thirdly, from moon and mercury , Ptoloney adds mars in condition hereof.
sentences.cn: 第三, 月亮和水星.托勒密同时也将火星列为考虑因素之一.

sentences.en: This Agreement commences on the date of signature hereof.
sentences.cn: 本协议自签字之日起生效。

sentences.en: Violation of Article 31 hereof concerning rules of compulsory enforcement or prohibition.
sentences.cn: 三违反依第三十一条所定办法中有关强制或禁止之规定.

sentences.en: We also agree to be bound by the Terms and Conditions on the reverse hereof.
sentences.cn: 本公司并同意接受本申请书背面约定条款之拘束.

sentences.en: You will find the signature of Mr. Y. at the foot hereof.
sentences.cn: 本函下面所示系Y先生的签名.

sentences.en: You will find the signature of Mr. Yokota at the foot hereof.
